alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:43AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 715 AM EDT... At 643 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud over Black Point, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homestead, Coral Gables, Black Point, The Redland, Kendall, Homestead Base, Naranja, Princeton, Richmond West, Leisure City, Palmetto Bay, Cutler Bay, Zoo Miami, Goulds, West Perrine, Homestead Bayfront Park, Richmond Heights, Country Walk, Inlikita and South Miami Heights. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
